title: SHADOWVERSE: THE CCG WITH A “WIN THE MATCH” CARD
content: Card games don’t stand still, of course, and Shadowverse recently launched its 109 card Darkness Evolved expansion. It’s a strong set, expanding archetypes, introducing new ideas and injecting plenty of additional life into the game as a whole. I’ve had a blast hopping back into the game, but one card in particular has really caught my attention.
